title: Residences of C. H. Bigelow and E. M. Deane, College Avenue, St. Paul, Minnesota
description: two Victorian style homes on a street with two carriages; house at left is brick; house at right is cream with red roof; figures on street, in yard and on sidewalk in front of house at left and on porch and front steps of house at right; inscription printed at bottom:  \"RESIDENCE OF C. H. BIGELOW, COLLEGE AVENUE, ST PAUL, MINN.  RESIDENCE OF E. M. DEANE, COLLEGE AVENUE, ST PAUL, MINN.]
